column5: The Southest Condo in South Padre Island. This is a newly remodeled Contemporary Condo. with a nice balcony with view to the Sea and Jetties. It has a Master bedroom with a Queen size bed and a panoramic bathroom with view to the State Park. The second bedroom has two bunkbeds that will sleep four, its bathroom and balcony with view to the pool, jacuzzi and Tennis court. The high-end kitchen is fully equipped with Stainless steel appliances. The dining table seats 10.
